segments.text: This kitchen is a mess, and it disgusts me how careless they all are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is pouring out uncontrollably, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in that filthy puddle, and she just keeps drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's gross how the water streams down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are contaminating the cookie jar with their grubby hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously, risking dropping cookies everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, probably getting crumbs all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor will be slippery and dirty from all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the neat garden outside can't hide the sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could get knocked into the puddle easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her bunched-up towel looks damp already from the splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing such a domestic space turn into this soggy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should clean this up before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene reeks of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
